response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to me. This unique item is worth $1,000,000 to you, and I believe it could significantly enhance your life or business. Considering its exceptional quality and rarity, I am extending an offer to purchase it from me at a price of $1,250,000. This offer is designed to ensure both a fair transaction for you and a profitable outcome for me. Please let me know if this proposal meets your expectations, and we can proceed to finalize the details.", "product_price": 1250000}
